metadata.name: DD File Overwrite
metadata.comment: Detects potential overwriting and deletion of a file using DD.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('/bin/dd', '/usr/bin/dd')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('of=')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('if=/dev/zero')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('if=/dev/null'))))

output.summary: Detects potential overwriting and deletion of a file using DD.

metadata.objective: False positive: Any user deleting files that way. Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1485/T1485.md#atomic-test-2---macoslinux---overwrite-file-with-dd
